TopicTitle: How to make an engine from scratch

Articles.Content:
Hello

I am very new to modding and I have been making a mod for quiet a while and I need engines for it.

I have put a modified engine config file on one of the parts I have already made and in the right click menu it said it was working fine but it stayed on the launchpad doing nothing.

If it helps I have made my parts the way shown in the YouTube video at the bottom.

Any help would be appreciated

welcome to the forum..

Have a look in this thread..

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-START-HERE
If you wish to make an engine from scratch, you must first invent the universe.
